attributes.additional_details: Is no fault of any person who is facing this. Tests have been cancelled and should have to resit another theory test. Also the expense aswel.
attributes.background: I want the parliament to look into extending time for those people who have lost almost a year not being able to learn driving properly, who have had tests cancelled, and are facing loosing their test’s due to their certificate expiration date coming to a end.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558160
